project.name: Hello World Demo
project.description: Simple demonstration: Create a Python script that prints a greeting

features.description: Create a greeting.py script that prints 'Hello from RALPH-AGI!' when executed
steps: Add a print statement with the greeting message
Ensure the script is executable with python greeting.py
acceptance_criteria: File greeting.py exists in the current directory
Running 'python greeting.py' outputs exactly 'Hello from RALPH-AGI!'
